snippet: Mirim Lee won the Meijer L.P.G.A. Classic for her first L.P.G.A. Tour victory, beating a fellow South Korean, Inbee Park, with a birdie on the second hole of a playoff at Blythefield Country Club in Belmont, Mich.
abstract: Mirim Lee wins Meijer LPGA Classic for her first LPGA Tour victory, at Blythefield Country Club in Belmont, Mich; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mirim Lee won the Meijer L.P.G.A. Classic for her first L.P.G.A. Tour victory, beating a fellow South Korean, Inbee Park, with a birdie on the second hole of a playoff at Blythefield Country Club in Belmont, Mich.

headline.main: L.P.G.A. Rookie Wins Playoff at Meijer Classic
headline.print_headline: L.P.G.A. Rookie Wins Playoff at Meijer Classic
